description.lang: The ZWN-BDS is a battery-powered and magnetic contact sensorthat indirectly controls lights and appliances throughout your house.It is fully compatible with other Z-Wave certified device from othermanufacturers and/or other applications. When magnetic contact isbroken, such as a door or window being opened, the ZWN-BDStransmits Open/Close status to the gateway.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline1. Battery Report2. Notification Report3. Device Reset Locally Notification
Access Control notifi rep: Notification Report
Home Security notifi rep: Notification Report
